detectors.description:

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in LinearFinance._burn(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LinearFinance__1.sol#719-726):

	- tokenStorage.setBalanceOf(account,tokenStorage.balanceOf(account).sub(amount)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LinearFinance__1.sol#723)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalSupply = totalSupply.sub(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/LinearFinance__1.sol#724)
